channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WATCH: Netanyahu nominates Trump for Nobel Peace Prize, gives him a copy of nominating letter

item.title: Why Trump Made His Fateful Trip to Butler
item.description: In an excerpt from her new book, journalist Salena Zito, an eyewitness to the near assassination, writes about the importance of place in American pol...

item.title: What Did President Kotlikoff Know, and When Did He Know It?
item.description: Cornell and its new president are in the Trump administration’s crosshairs for alleged civil rights violations.

item.title: New Economic Plan, Old Economic Folly
item.description: The protectionist agenda of national conservatives strikes me as nonsensical.

item.title: The Media Deploy A Cadre Of ‘Experts’ And ‘Advocates’ To Lie About Medicaid
item.description: But the American people aren’t stupid. Many see right through the media bias, which might explain why trust in the mainstream press continues to fall.

item.title: Motherhood Only Feels Like A ‘Penalty’ When Women Succumb To Feminism
item.description: Raising children didn’t become controversial until feminism convinced women that the best life mimicked men and prioritized work over family.

item.title: The Return Of Superman Signals A Culture Shift In America
item.description: There are signs that American culture is beginning to move away from our obsession with deconstruction and cynicism — and Superman is one of them.

item.title: Politifact: You Can’t Call Mamdani A Communist Just Because He Said All These Communist Things
item.description: Sure, cheap groceries sounds nicer than seizing the means of production, but ultimately Socialism turns to Communism.

item.title: Don’t Blame Donald Trump for Floods
item.description: The fact-free, malicious attacks constitute one of the more poisonously stupid episodes of the Trump years.

item.title: The Milei ‘Miracle’ Is a Vindication of Free Markets
item.description: We hope the world is watching.

item.title: Mexicans Don’t Want Foreign Grifters To Ruin Their Home. Americans Shouldn’t Either
item.description: Wanting to protect your community from becoming unrecognizable isn't bigotry, it's patriotism.
